commitResults.messageTitle: Greets the user
Exits with goodbye message
Adds horizontal lines
Adds echo method
Echoes commands until bye is input.
Adds indentations
Renames command to task, creates a task list, modifies echo method to add task to list
Adds method that prints task list
Creates a new Task class
Adds mark, unmark, and toString methods to Task class
Adds isCommandBye, isCommandList, and getTask methods.
Adds isCommandMark, isCommandUnmark, and getIndex methods.
Adds markTaskAsDone and markTaskAsNotDone methods
Adds classes Todo, Deadline and Event that extend the Task class.
Adds isCommandTodo, isCommandDeadline, isCommandEvent, and numTasks methods.
Adds methods that gets the fields to be used in the Todo, Deadline, and Event constructors.
Replaces addTask method with addTodo, addDeadline, addEvent methods, modifies control flow
Updates input and expected scripts for automated testing
Handles empty description errors and unknown command errors
Adds support for deleting tasks from the list.
Uses Enums for Command Types and moves different classes to new files
Moves methods from Virtue class to other classes
Initializes task list from hard drive when chatbot starts up.
Writes task list into file after list is modified.
Merge branch 'branch-Level-7'
commitResults.messageBody:
* branch-Level-7:
  Writes task list into file after list is modified.
  Initializes task list from hard drive when chatbot starts up.

commitResults.messageTitle: Adds assert checks to the code
Refactors the code to improve code quality.
commitResults.messageBody:
The sandwich and indent features are obsolete due to the new GUI.

The applyCommand method is better not without
a String output because it is public.

Let's
* remove the sandwich and indent methods in Virtue class
* remove its usages
* create a resultMessage field in Command class
* make the applyCommand method set the Command resultMessage

commitResults.messageBody: Adds assert checks to the code

  Adds assert checks to the code

  Refactors the code to improve code quality.

commitResults.messageTitle: Provide a way to perform commands on multiple tasks
commitResults.messageBody:
The mark, unmark, and delete commands
can be applied to several tasks.

Adding this features makes it more convenient for the user.

Let's,
* update the getIndex method to accept multiple indices
* update the markTasksAsDone, markTasksAsNotDone, and deleteTasks
  methods to accept an array of indices

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'branch-C-MassOps'
commitResults.messageBody:
* branch-C-MassOps:
  Provide a way to perform commands on multiple tasks

commitResults.messageTitle: Give credit for reused work
commitResults.messageBody:
Several lines in the getIndices method were taken and modified from several websites.

Let's,
* add comments citing the sources for the code

commitResults.messageTitle: Add a representative screenshot to the docs folder
commitResults.messageBody:
A good product screenshot showcases the product in its full glory.

Let's,
* produce a sample run with realistic data
* take a screenshot of the sample run
* add the screenshot to the docs folder

commitResults.messageTitle: Add a brief user guide
commitResults.messageBody:
A user guide is needed for users to understand how to use
the chatbot's commands.

Let's add the command details and examples, together with
the Ui.png image, to the user guide.

commitResults.messageTitle: Provide appropriate messages to invalid inputs
commitResults.messageBody:
When a user inputs an empty description or index,
or an index out of range, the user must be alerted.

Let's,
* check if a description is not entirely whitespace
* check if all indices are in the appropriate range
* alert the user if the conditions are not satisfied
